name: Floral Wave
description:
Well, I won't have much to say about it

Briefly, this prototype is my attempt on making a game in one day . At first I was up for a 2 days game with a friend of mine, but we got problem, so we canceled our first project, but I didn't want to give up on this Game jam so I tried again the next day (starting at 8:00)

The game is absolutly not over, there are important features I couldn't add, and I couldn't make any sprite or audio asset ... but well, I had some fun . And I'll finish this game in the next days ! (If I don't get as unmotivated as ever)
